ca.ualberta.cs.funtime_runtime

Class AuthorReplyActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ca.ualberta.cs.funtime_runtime.CustomActivity
        • ca.ualberta.cs.funtime_runtime.AuthorReplyActivity

  • public class AuthorReplyActivity
extends CustomActivity
    A view class that allows a user to edit text and submit it as a reply to a question or answer. The user can also cancel the creation of an answer. The question body and title or the answer are displayed above the edit text segment.
    Author:
    Kieran Boyle

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addLocation(View v)
      This part of the program simply adds the location by an alert dialog and then getting the current geolocation so that it can be displayed to the user upon submission of the answer

      this onClick listener for a button simply submits whatever has been entered into the text field.

      this function adds items to the action bar if it present

        public void addReply(View v)
        this onClick listener for a button simply submits whatever has been entered into the text field. this button also leaves the activity after the reply is submitted
